Txt_Talk_Burg_1_House01_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: I have decided that I will build a town here.
*: A town here would surely please and profit the people of the world.
*: But for a town, I need trade, and for trade, I require a merchant.
*: Experience does not concern me. Any merchant will do. Will the wind blow one my way soon, I wonder...?
*: Stay awhile, {WORD}. I have need of your aid. Will you help me?
*: It will mean the end of your adventuring days. It might even mean that one day your bones are buried here.
*: That is great news. Then come, {WORD}, let us build the future together! We begin today!
Well, it looks like I'll be staying here, then.
I'll put all my stuff in the bag. I won't be needing it any more.
Well, it looks like I'll be staying here, then.
I'll put all my stuff in the bag. I won't be needing it any more.
*: You won't? That is a shame...
*: I will tell you something in return for the favour you have done me.
*: In the centre of this continent lies the village of Persistence. Search around the well there. You will not be disappointed.
I'll never forget the time we spent together... (sniff)
I'll never forget the time we spent together... (sniff)

Txt_Talk_Burg_1_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010.Text: Hi there, {MOST_HEROIC}! It's me, {MERCHANT}! I bet you barely recognised me!
I'm in the middle of building a shop. Exciting, eh?
Hi there, {MOST_HEROIC}! It's me, {MERCHANT}! I bet you barely recognised me!
I'm in the middle of building a shop. Exciting, eh?

Txt_Talk_Burg_2_House01_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: We have a shop at last. This is thanks to you. Our settlement is in your debt.

Txt_Talk_Burg_2_Item_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR.Text: Well, well, well, if it isn't {MOST_HEROIC}! Long time no see, old friend!
Keep an eye on this place. It'll be a bustling city before long, you'll see!
Well, well, well, if it isn't {MOST_HEROIC}! Long time no see, old friend!
Keep an eye on this place. It'll be a bustling city before long, you'll see!
Zzz... Take that, you horrible monster! (sigh) Zzz...
Zzz... Take that, you horrible monster! (sigh) Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Burg_3_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010.Text: Hello, {MOST_HEROIC}! It's me, {MERCHANT}. How've you been?
The place is looking pretty good, eh? I'm thinking of putting a cabaret club here. What do you think?
Hello, {MOST_HEROIC}! It's me, {MERCHANT}. How've you been?
The place is looking pretty good, eh? I'm thinking of putting a cabaret club here. What do you think?

Txt_Talk_Burg_3_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120_010.Text: My sole aim in life now is to make this place the greatest city in the world.
Who'd have thought I'd ever say that, eh? My adventuring days seem so long ago...
My sole aim in life now is to make this place the greatest city in the world.
Who'd have thought I'd ever say that, eh? My adventuring days seem so long ago...

Txt_Talk_Burg_3_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010.Text: *: This place'll be a huge city one day, just you wait!

Txt_Talk_Burg_3_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_010.Text: *: Goodness me... I can't believe someone's gone and built all this all the way out here...
*: Frontier towns like these are regular gold mines! I'll be coming back, you can count on that!

Txt_Talk_Burg_3_House01_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: The town grows bigger and bigger. The future is bright. And none of it would have been possible without you.
*: {MERCHANT} is a very capable individual. I could not have picked a better partner.

Txt_Talk_Burg_3_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010.Text: *: Mountaincleaver... The sword capable of shaking the mightiest peak to its very foundations...
*: Oh, how I covet it! But where can it be found? I have not the first idea where to look...

Txt_Talk_Burg_3_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_010.Text: *: Ah-phew... Ah-phew... Mountaincleaver... Where do you hide...? Why do you elude me...? Ah-phew...

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_MAIN_0_VOLUME_0010_0.Text:
*: Ere, I've got an idea<--->why don't we...
(whisper whisper)

*: But if we do that, it might...
(whisper whisper)
*: What, so you just wanna let that big bully carry on... (mutter mumble)

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010.Text: *: You ever been down to Lanson? Lovely little place! Got this great big shrine, it 'as.
*: They say if you can get through it, there's a cave on the other side where they keep the blue orb! Fancy that, eh?
*: Course, it ain't as simple as just strollin' through. There's some kind of test you 'ave to do or somefink...

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120_010.Text: *: There's only one fing for it<--->revolution!
*: And there ain't nuffink you can do to stop us, so don't even try!

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010.Text: *: This 'ere's {MERCHANT}'s mansion. Visitors by appointment only!

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_010.Text: *: {MERCHANT}'s in bed. And so should you be! Go on, sling yer 'ook!

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_010.Text: *: And welcome to <Cap>{MERCHANT}burg, founded by the great {MERCHANT}!

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_010.Text: *: Friend! It is me, the old dreamer who founded this place! It is good to see you. We need to talk.
*: {MERCHANT} has done well. Perhaps too well. The townspeople are beginning to grumble.
*: I worry what they might do...

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0420_010.Text: *: I must meet with {MERCHANT}. The townspeople are unhappy.
*: Please. You must let me through.

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_010.Text: *: I come out this way to do a bit of business every now and again.
*: It's flying up at a rate of knots, isn't it? You wouldn't believe what it looked like when I first came here...

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_010.Text: *: {MERCHANT} works us poor townspeople to the bone!
*: We'll all drop dead from exhaustion if it carries on like this!

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0620_010.Text: *: Don't breathe a word of this to anyone, or else!

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0720_010.Text: *: We won't put up with this tyranny any longer!

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_House01_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: Hello, old friend! Lovely to see you! This place is finally starting to come together, don't you think?
But there's still more work to be done. It'll be incredible when it's finished, just you wait and see!
Hello, old friend! Lovely to see you! This place is finally starting to come together, don't you think?
But there's still more work to be done. It'll be incredible when it's finished, just you wait and see!

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_.Text:
*: ♪ Oh, the silver orb sits in the dark Necrogooond...
The mountainous realm of the near beyooond! ♪
*: ♪ But the shrine that contains this most precious of peeearls... ♪

*: ♪ Sits atop a high peak where the sombre cloud swiiirls!
Surely none in the land could its dizzy heights cliiimb...
So the orb, to we mortals, is lost for all tiiime! ♪

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Item_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR.Text: *: What's that? The old man? He's out taking a stroll around and looking at his handiwork.

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Theater_1F_SUB_0_VOLUME_.Text: *: Leaving so soon? That's a shame. Right, shall I tot up your bill for you? Let's see...
*: That'll be... Yes. 50,000 gold coins. Will you be paying now?
*: What's that? You're a friend of {MERCHANT}'s? Oh, ah... I... Uh... F-Forget I said anything!
*: Leaving so soon? That's a shame. Right, shall I tot up your bill for you? Let's see...
*: That'll be... Yes. 50,000 gold coins. Will you be paying now?
*: What's that? You're a friend of {MERCHANT}'s? Oh, ah... I... Uh... F-Forget I said anything!

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Theater_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: What's that? You're a friend of {MERCHANT}'s? Oh, ah... I... Uh... F-Forget I said anything!
*: EEK! OVER HERE! I LOVE YOOOU!
*: Hmm... I just don't get what's supposed to be so good about them...
*: I mean, they're all very handsome and everything, but the songs... Ugh.
*: Hic! Oh dear, I... I think I might have had a bit too much to drink... (burp)
*: Welcome, welcome! Fancy a drink? We've got everything under the sun behind here! Ah, but you're probably still a bit too young for this stuff, eh? Milk would be perfect for you, I'd say.

*: ♪ Oh, the two of us will always be togetherrr!
Holding hands from now until foreverrr! ♪

*: ♪ And no one's ever ever gonna tear us apart!
It's you and me my baby, you're my world and my heart! ♪
*: Who are you? Are you a fan or something?
*: It's lovely to meet you, but could you get off the stage while we're performing? Thanks!

Txt_Talk_Burg_4_Theater_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_1.Text: *: What's that? You're a friend of {MERCHANT}'s? Oh, ah... I... Uh... F-Forget I said anything!
*: That's the stuff, girls! Lovely jubbly!
*: Well, you have to say... Building a lovely place like this... I mean, hats off to old {MERCHANT}.
*: Hey, did you just look at my...?
*: You did, didn't you, you horrible so-and-so!
*: Hee hee! I'm joking, silly! Aww, you should see the look on your face!
*: Welcome, welcome! Fancy a drink? We've got everything under the sun behind here! Ah, but you're probably still a bit too young for this stuff, eh? Milk would be perfect for you, I'd say.
*: Fancy getting up on stage yourself, do you? Well, don't let me stop you.
*: But if you lay a finger on any of us, I'll break it off, you hear?
*: So, what do you think? I've got some pretty snazzy moves, eh?

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010.Text: *: Welcome to the People's Republic of <Cap>{MERCHANT}burg, no longer under the dictatorship of the evil {MERCHANT}!

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010.Text: *: This is the oh-so-magnificent mansion of the once-mighty {MERCHANT}<--->who now resides in less spacious lodgings. Heh heh heh...
*: This is the oh-so-magnificent mansion of the once-mighty {MERCHANT}<--->who now resides in less spacious lodgings. Heh heh heh...

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_010.Text: *: Sorry, mate. If ye're after directions, I'm afraid I can't help ya. I'm just a mercenary hired to guard the town.
*: I think they said the place was founded by someone called {MERCHANT}. Oh, but they threw the ol' bludger in jail. Bit harsh if you ask me...

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_010.Text: *: Is it true that you used to go around with {MERCHANT}?
*: Is it true that you used to go around with {MERCHANT}?
*: Is it true that you used to go around with {MERCHANT}?
*: Is it true that you used to go around with {MERCHANT}?
*: No, it can't be. You seem far too nice.

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_010.Text: *: A man came here a while back hoping to sell what he called <6>the yellow orb of legend<9><--->claimed it was worth a fortune.
*: And guess what? That's right. That spendthrift despot {MERCHANT} forked over a sizeable portion of the municipal funds for it!

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0420_010.Text: *: I'm afraid we close in the evenings. Come back tomorrow morning, alright?

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_010.Text: *: I can't help but feel that things were better back when {MERCHANT} was in charge. (sigh) The grass is always greener, eh...?

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_House01_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: The people finally revolted. They couldn't take it any more. And they have thrown {MERCHANT} in jail. How did it come to this?

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_House01_1F_SearchObj_Cha.Text: Look at that: there's a safe back here! Although, you haven't got the foggiest idea how to open it.

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Item_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR.Text: *: Ahh, I can't tell you how glad I am I took a risk and moved out here.
*: Who'd ever have thought I'd find love at my age, eh?

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Prison_1F_SUB_0_VOLUME_0.Text: {MOST_HEROIC}! Is it really you!? Oh, thank goodness you're here! It's me, {MERCHANT}!
I thought I was doing what was best for everybody, but as you can see, they didn't quite agree.
Oh, by the way, there's something I want you to have.
It's hidden in my safe. I didn't want any of the townspeople to find it...
Look behind the thro<---> Er...the big chair in my mansion! Anyway, here's how you open the safe...
I'm going to stay here and try to figure out where it all went wrong.
They'll forgive me one day, don't you think? They have to, after all I've done for them...
Come and see me when I'm back on top, won't you?
I thought I was doing what was best for everybody, but as you can see, they didn't quite agree.
Oh, by the way, there's something I want you to have.
It's hidden in my safe. I didn't want any of the townspeople to find it...
Look behind the thro<---> Er...the big chair in my mansion! Anyway, here's how you open the safe...
I'm going to stay here and try to figure out where it all went wrong.
They'll forgive me one day, don't you think? They have to, after all I've done for them...
Come and see me when I'm back on top, won't you?

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Prison_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_01.Text: *: This is the town jail. {MERCHANT} built it to house criminals, reprobates and other assorted ne'er-do-wells.
*: Which is quite ironic when you think about it. Heh heh heh.

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Prison_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_02.Text: Thanks. It's really sweet of you to try and break me out of jail, but I can't go running off.
I'm going to stay here and try to figure out where it all went wrong.
They'll forgive me one day, don't you think? They have to, after all I've done for them...
Come and see me when I'm back on top, won't you?
Thanks. It's really sweet of you to try and break me out of jail, but I can't go running off.
I'm going to stay here and try to figure out where it all went wrong.
They'll forgive me one day, don't you think? They have to, after all I've done for them...
Come and see me when I'm back on top, won't you?

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Theater_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: Welcome to the Little Stars theatre for gifted children!
*: Do come in and watch some of the children perform. Oh, they're so talented! Particularly my Nevada...

*: ♪ Ohh, slimey slime, it's sliming tiiime!
Come and sing a slimy rhyme with meee! ♪
...Was that alright, Mummy?
But it's so scary... Do I have to...?
*: Kids these days can sing so much better than we used to. Times change, eh?
*: Would you like a glass of pop? We've got an absolutely smashing range of soft drinks.
*: Ooh, my little starlet's up next! Come on, Trayven, do Mummy proud!

Txt_Talk_Burg_5_Weapon_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACT.Text:
*: I'm the captain of the town guard.
Foreigners, trespassers and vagrants are kindly requested to go back where they came from!

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010.Text: *: Welcome to the town of <Cap>{MERCHANT}burg, named for its founder, the merchant {MERCHANT}! Enjoy your visit!

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010.Text: *: Welcome to {MERCHANT}'s mansion! Please, go on inside!

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_010.Text: *: I'm afraid {MERCHANT} has gone to bed. Would you mind coming back tomorrow?

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_020.Text: *: Welcome to the Mayor's residence! Please, go on inside!

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_020.Text: *: The Mayor has retired for the night. Would you mind coming back tomorrow?

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_010.Text: *: Hear ye! Hear ye! This eventide, I shall undertake to give a recital! Citizens, I hereby invite you to attend!

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_010.Text: *: The bigger I get, the bigger this town gets. And it's going to keep on getting bigger, just like me!
*: I can't wait to see how it turns out!

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_020.Text: *: You're {MERCHANT}, aren't you? I've heard of you.
*: All the adults are always saying, <6>That {MERCHANT} was a real {WORD}!<9>
*: But what other kind of person could have built a town this big and amazing. I think it's brilliant!
*: All the adults are always saying, <6>That {MERCHANT} was a real {WORD}!<9>
*: Pretty surprised that kind of person could have built a town this big and amazing. Never judge a book by its cover, eh?
*: The reason our town is so big and brilliant is because of {MERCHANT}! {MERCHANT} is amaaazing!

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_010.Text: *: {MERCHANT}'s iron grip on the town has finally loosened a little.
*: Now we, the people, can work together to make this place great.

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_020.Text: *: Welcome to <Cap>{MERCHANT}burg! Give us your tired, your poor, your huddled masses! All are welcome here!
*: My goodness! {MERCHANT}! Is that really you? It's good to see you!
*: You just focus on your adventuring, okay? The town's safe in our hands! Good luck out there!

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_010.Text: *: THat'LL bE 3254 gOLd cOiNs PLeaSe. Ah, PAyiNg wiTH 4000 aRe wE? AlRiGHt, heRe'S yoUr CHange<--->656 gOLd cOiNs... WaIT iS thAt rIgHT...?
...and a monster is revealed before your eyes!
{LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_House01_1F_SUB_0_VOLUME_.Text: *: Y-You want me to what!? Really?
Yes, really. I want you to run this place instead of me.
Yes, really. I want you to run this place instead of me.
*: You can do it. The townspeople have already said they support your nomination.
*: Th-They have? Well then, I suppose it would be rude not to... Alright, I'll do it! I've no idea how good at it I'll be, but...I'll do my best.

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_House01_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: I have a lot of respect for {MERCHANT}.
*: We'll look after the town. There's no need to worry on that front.
*: {MERCHANT}! Welcome home!
*: Don't worry, I'm looking after the town you worked so hard to build. And I'll keep on looking after it!
*: I cannot believe that the town {MERCHANT} and I founded has grown so much.
*: Soon it will be time for me to leave it to fend for itself at last.
*: How is {MERCHANT} getting on?
*: It would be nice to see my old partner once in a while...
*: {MERCHANT}... It's been a while.
*: This place was just a field back when we started. Just look how big it has grown.
*: I see this town as my child.
*: The bigger and stronger it grows, the happier I become.
{MOST_HEROIC}... I've decided it's time for me to leave town.
They're big enough to look after themselves now. They don't need me any more.
Hey...you wouldn't mind taking me along on an adventure or two for old time's sake, would you?
Well, I won't twist your arm. I'll be at Patty's Place in Aliahan if you need me.
If you ever feel like you could use a hand, just come and get me.
Hopefully I'll see you soon, then. Bye for now!
{MOST_HEROIC}... I've decided it's time for me to leave town.
They're big enough to look after themselves now. They don't need me any more.
Hey...you wouldn't mind taking me along on an adventure or two for old time's sake, would you?
Well, I won't twist your arm. I'll be at Patty's Place in Aliahan if you need me.
If you ever feel like you could use a hand, just come and get me.
Hopefully I'll see you soon, then. Bye for now!

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_House02_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: Now then, what shall we have for dinner this evening? Let me see...
*: I should really thank {MERCHANT} for making this town so big and prosperous if I get the chance...
*: You're {MERCHANT}, aren't you? Is it true you're the reason this town is so big and prosperous?
*: I've found a new lease of life here, and so have my husband and son! Thank you so, so much!
*: Hello there, traveller! What do you say? Fancy settling here too?
*: It's an absolutely smashing place to live! The quality of life is just...

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_.Text: *: I think the time is coming when this place will no longer be needing soldiers like me to guard it.
*: I'd better start looking for a new job...

*: I'm the captain of the town guard.
To be honest, it's so peaceful, there's nothing much to do. Not that I'm complaining, of course.

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Item_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR.Text: *: <6>I love you too, my dear. I shall move in immediately.<9>
*: Can you believe he actually said that? He was too embarrassed to even be seen with me not so long ago! Hee hee!
*: Ahh, the town's at peace, and my old man, the old man, is finally settling down. Thanks to me, of course!

Txt_Talk_Burg_6_Theater_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: Ooh, you've come at just the right time<--->the town bard is giving a recital.
*: I'll win first prize again today, just you wait and see! Mummy says I was born to win!

♪ You are my kiiing,
You are my everythiiing! ♪

♪ This is why I siiing,
Give me my diamond riiing! ♪

*: I'm a fan of the more rousing numbers, you know? Like that one about the hero defeating the Archfiend.
D'you know it? It's a cracker!
*: Come on, Anna, just like Mummy showed you!

*: ♪ Oh, where did you go, my darling deeear?
There's a hole by my side 'cause you are not heeere! ♪

*: ♪ Though I cry myself blind ev'ry night we're apaaart...
I know that you'll always be here in my heaaart! ♪
*: Ohh, it gets you right there, doesn't it? (sniff)
